data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 2, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Matheus Jesus (Bragantino) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 6, Paranaense have a goal kick.
Bragantino needs to be cautious. Paranaense have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 7, Throw-in high up the field for Bragantino in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 9, Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Bragantino's Artur gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
In the minute 10, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Paranaense's Wellington gets in a shot on goal at Arena da Baixada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 12, Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matheus Jesus (Bragantino) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Bragantino's Claudinho misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 13, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Paranaense a goal kick.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Claudinho for Bragantino who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 15, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Bragantino's Claudinho looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Paranaense take a 1-0 lead thanks to Geuvanio.
In the minute 17, That's a fine assist from Erick.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 20, Important block from the Paranaense defence as Ricardo Ryller fires in a strike for Bragantino.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Free kick Bragantino.
In the minute 21, Ricardo Ryller for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Bragantino's Aderlan gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 23, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Paranaense a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 25, It's a goal kick for the home team in Curitiba.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
In the minute 25, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Bragantino goal kick.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 28, Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Claudinho levels the score at 1-1.
Matheus Jesus with an assist there.
In the minute 32, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
Throw-in Bragantino.
In the minute 33, In Curitiba Bragantino attack through Ricardo Ryller. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 36, At Arena da Baixada, Paranaense are penalized for being offside.
Free kick Bragantino.
Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 37, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Paranaense's half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In Curitiba, Artur of Bragantino is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Bragantino awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Bragantino push forward at Arena da Baixada and Artur gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Paranaense defence.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Matheus Jesus (Bragantino) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Curitiba.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bragantino.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Paranaense.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Curitiba.
Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
In the minute 50, Bragantino awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Paranaense.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
Can Bragantino get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Paranaense's half?
Paranaense have a goal kick.
In the minute 55, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Paranaense's Wellington has been booked in Curitiba and will miss the next match through suspension.
Paranaense are coming forward and Leo Cittadini gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 57, The home team have replaced Pedrinho with Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva. This is the first substitution made today by Eduardo Maciel de Barros.
In the minute 59, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Bragantino in their own half.
Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Bragantino.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Bruno Tubarao is on a sub for Leandrinho for Bragantino.
In the minute 61, Felipe de Oliveira Conceicao is making the team's second substitution at Arena da Baixada with Ytalo replacing Jan Hurtado.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
In the minute 63, Bragantino drive upfield and Ytalo gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
Can Bragantino capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Paranaense's half?
In the minute 64, Geuvanio is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Geuvanio returns to the field for Paranaense after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 68, The home team has substituted Geuvanio with Christian. Eduardo Maciel de Barros is thus making his second change.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bragantino have a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Carlos Eduardo is replacing Erick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Bragantino have been awarded a corner by Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Bragantino to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a Bragantino throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 75, Christian (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ball safe as Bragantino is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
In the minute 77, Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Paranaense's Leo Cittadini breaks free at Arena da Baixada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Curitiba.
Throw-in Paranaense.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Bragantino make their third substitution with Uillian Correia replacing Ricardo Ryller.
In the minute 80, Goal kick for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes signals a free kick to Paranaense.
At Arena da Baixada, Claudinho has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Bragantino territory.
In the minute 81, The home team replace Wellington with Richard.
Walter is replacing Bissoli for the home team.
In the minute 82, Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bragantino's half?
Free kick Bragantino.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Bragantino in their own half.
Claudinho for Bragantino gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 85, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Bragantino.
Wagner do Nascimento Magalhaes awards Bragantino a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Morato is on a sub for Artur for Bragantino.
The away team replace Matheus Jesus with Lucas Evangelista.
Throw-in for Paranaense at Arena da Baixada.
In the minute 89, Throw-in for Bragantino in the half of Paranaense.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Bragantino.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
In Curitiba a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Paranaense in their own half.
Free kick for Bragantino in their own half.
That's full-time at Arena da Baixada. The final score is 1-1.
Bruno Tubarao (Bragantino) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Khellven (Paranaense) gets a yellow card.
